title: kunrA navanidhiyE
sahitya:
kunrA navanidhiyE manrADum jyOtiyE kumArA amarar kurai tIrkkum perumAnE


anupallavi

  nanrAga ulagilE ninrOngi vAzhavE nallArk-aruL purivAi ellArkkum iraivanE


caraNam    paN kaND-aruNagiri pADiya muruganE padiyanbar tudi sheyyum tirumAl maruganE
kaN kaNDa deivamE kali kaNDa arputamE kandA en cintaiyil vandAL guruparanE
